Class ChannelDTOMapper

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    The ChannelDTOMapper is an utility class to map channels into channel data transfer objects (DTOs).
    Author:
    Stefan Bu√üweiler - Initial contribution, Kai Kreuzer - added DTO to channel mapping
